book.synopsis: FOR USE IN SCHOOLS AND LIBRARIES ONLY. Kaz, Star, Adriana, and Dante have discovered a sunken treasure ship, but nobody wants them to get near it, so it will take a whole lot of ingenuity and teamwork for the kids to get back what is rightfully theirs. Original.
book.dimensions: Height: 7.5 Inches, Length: 0.5 Inches, Weight: 0.45 Pounds, Width: 5.25 Inches
